description: This table contains the history of edits for a dental tooth record.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the finding record

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DENTAL_PATIENT_CSN
columns.description: Stores the patient encounter in which a particular contact of the record was modified if it was available.

columns.name: DENTAL_MOD_USER_ID
columns.description: Stores the user who modified the tooth record.

columns.name: DENTAL_MOD_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the date and time when the tooth record was modified.

columns.name: DEN_TOO_STAT_HIST_C_NAME
columns.description:
Keeps track of how status of a tooth changes over time.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Missing


Erupted


Unerupted


Partially Erupted


Bridged


Implant


Denture


Other

columns.name: DENT_ACTIVE_HIST_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column keeps track of whether a tooth was shown in the tooth chart over time.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Inactive


Active

columns.name: DENT_CHRON_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: This is the date and time the documentation was made for, such as when documenting past historical data.
